AnalyzerTestData.Text: Ein anderer Text mit etwas gehobenen anforderungen an den Wort Zähler. Auch der absatz sollte richtig erkannt werden.

Gluten
Keywords Gluten Glutenfrei Weizen
Content

Was ist Gluten? Der Begriff Gluten stammt von dem lateinischen 12654 Wort glūten ab und bedeutet Leim. Gluten ist nicht ein einzelner Stoff sondern ein Stoffgemisch welches in den Samen vieler Getreide vorkommt. Gluten ist auch dafür verantwortlich das durch Zugabe von Wasser zu Mehl eine gummiartige und elastische Masse, der Teig, entsteht.§§§

</div> <div style="float:right"></div> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </div> </div> </div> <div id="review-panel-right" style="width: 406px;"> <h1 class="page-title">Tropico 5 – Design your tropical island!</h1> <ul id="review-tags-list"> <li> <strong>Release Date:</strong> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/release_dates/2014/" rel="tag">2014</a>, <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/release_dates/may/" rel="tag">May</a> </li> <li> <strong>Genre:</strong> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/genres/city-builder/" rel="tag">City Builder</a>, <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/genres/simulation/" rel="tag">Simulation</a>, <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/genres/strategy/" rel="tag">Strategy</a> </li> <li> <strong>Platform:</strong> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/platforms/pc/" rel="tag">PC</a>, <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/platforms/playstation-4/" rel="tag">Playstation 4</a>, <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/platforms/x-box-360/" rel="tag">X-Box 360</a> </li> <li> <strong>Studio:</strong> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/studios/haemimont-games/" rel="tag">Haemimont Games</a>, <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/studios/kalypso-media-digital/" rel="tag">Kalypso Media Digital</a> </li> </ul> </div> </div> <div id="review-panels"> <div class="review-panel" id="reviewtabReview"> <div id="post-content"> <div class='at-above-post addthis-toolbox' data-title='Tropico 5 – Design your tropical island!' data-url='http://www.citybuilder.info/review/tropico-5/'></div> <div class='at-above-post-recommended addthis-toolbox' data-title='Tropico 5 – Design your tropical island!' data-url='http://www.citybuilder.info/review/tropico-5/'></div> <p> This game is the 5th part of the series. In contrast to the first two parts of the series the parts 3 to 5 are published by <a href="http://www.kalypsomedia.com/" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article', 'http://www.kalypsomedia.com/', 'Kalypso Media Digital');" title="Kalypso Media Digital" target="_blank">Kalypso Media Digital</a>. So lets see what’s new. <strong>Tropico 5</strong> got developed by <a href="http://www.haemimontgames.com/" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article', 'http://www.haemimontgames.com/', 'Haemimont Games');" title="Haemimont Games" target="_blank">Haemimont Games</a> and is based on a new engine. </p> <h2>Graphics of Tropico 5</h2> <p> The graphic of the game is able to soak the player right into a caribbean feeling. When you’re looking for a photo realistic city building game <a href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00JMM1GP0/ref=nosim?tag=citybuilderinfo-20" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article', 'http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00JMM1GP0/ref=nosim?tag=citybuilderinfo-20', 'Tropico 5');" title="Tropico 5" target="_blank">Tropico 5</a> might not be the right choice for you but when you are able to look past comic like graphic style you can spend hours just looking at your citizens roaming around your island. </p> <p>The graphics are perfect for the game setting.</p> <div id='gallery-1' class='gallery galleryid-81 gallery-columns-3 gallery-size-thumbnail'> <div class='gallery-item'> <dt class='gallery-icon landscape'> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/001.jpg" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article-int', 'http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/001.jpg', '');"> <img width="150" height="150" src="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/150x150x001-150x150.jpg.pagespeed.ic.1KTZVR0Qf4.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Tropico 5 Graphics Detail Example" aria-describedby="gallery-1-48" pagespeed_url_hash="4252278093"/> </a> </dt> <dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-1-48'> Cold War residential area with police station and the palace in the background. </dd> </div> <div class='gallery-item'> <dt class='gallery-icon landscape'> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/002.jpg" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article-int', 'http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/002.jpg', '');"> <img width="150" height="150" src="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/150x150x002-150x150.jpg.pagespeed.ic.XiEx6fYlza.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Tropico 5 Graphics Details" aria-describedby="gallery-1-49" pagespeed_url_hash="1041832766"/> </a> </dt> <dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-1-49'> Cold War view of a restaurant with a parking lot and a banana plantation in the background. </dd> </div> <div class='gallery-item'> <dt class='gallery-icon landscape'> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/003.jpg" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article-int', 'http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/003.jpg', '');"> <img width="150" height="150" src="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/150x150x003-150x150.jpg.pagespeed.ic.POMi2uqBrA.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Tropico 5 Graphics Detail Example" aria-describedby="gallery-1-63" pagespeed_url_hash="2126354735"/> </a> </dt> <dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-1-63'> Cold War a view of one of the main roads connecting the harbor with the residential area with the lighthouse in the background. </dd> </div> <br style="clear: both"/> <div class='gallery-item'> <dt class='gallery-icon landscape'> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/004.jpg" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article-int', 'http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/004.jpg', '');"> <img width="150" height="150" src="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/150x150x004-150x150.jpg.pagespeed.ic.SY8R4CMX3Z.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Tropico 5 Graphics Detail Example" aria-describedby="gallery-1-64" pagespeed_url_hash="3210876704"/> </a> </dt> <dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-1-64'> Cold War a nice view of the harbor. Also shows some closeup detail of the citizens. </dd> </div> <div class='gallery-item'> <dt class='gallery-icon landscape'> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/005.jpg" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article-int', 'http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/005.jpg', '');"> <img width="150" height="150" src="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/150x150x005-150x150.jpg.pagespeed.ic.feHT_qn0IA.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Tropico 5 Graphics Example Zoom Out" aria-describedby="gallery-1-65" pagespeed_url_hash="431377"/> </a> </dt> <dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-1-65'> Colonial Era view of the starting structure in a sandbox game. </dd> </div> <div class='gallery-item'> <dt class='gallery-icon landscape'> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/010.jpg" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article-int', 'http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/010.jpg', '');"> <img width="150" height="150" src="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/150x150x010-150x150.jpg.pagespeed.ic.wteYORZW5w.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Tropico 5 Graphics Detail Example" aria-describedby="gallery-1-71" pagespeed_url_hash="3506213295"/> </a> </dt> <dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-1-71'> Detail view of a citizen. The harbor in the back with a freighter that exports Tropican goods. </dd> </div> <br style="clear: both"/> </div> <h2>Game Play</h2> <p>The game play is clearly structured. Your goal is to rule your small island during 4 epochs.</p> <ul> <li>Colonial Era</li> <li>World Wars</li> <li>Cold War</li> <li>Modern</li> </ul> <p> The UI of <a href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00JMM1GP0/ref=nosim?tag=citybuilderinfo-20" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article', 'http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00JMM1GP0/ref=nosim?tag=citybuilderinfo-20', 'Tropico 5');" title="Tropico 5" target="_blank">Tropico 5</a> very friendly. See for your self in the screenshots. </p> <p>Make sure to accept and fulfill quests while expanding your island. And always keep an eye on your balance. It’s a great example of an economics simulation. Expand your production and increase export. Attract new citizens, make and keep them happy.</p> <p>The game play is very good.</p> <div id='gallery-2' class='gallery galleryid-81 gallery-columns-3 gallery-size-thumbnail'> <div class='gallery-item'> <dt class='gallery-icon landscape'> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/006.jpg" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article-int', 'http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/006.jpg', '');"> <img width="150" height="150" src="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/150x150x006-150x150.jpg.pagespeed.ic.QNEZfcJ0PQ.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Tropico 5 Build Menu" aria-describedby="gallery-2-66" pagespeed_url_hash="1084953346"/> </a> </dt> <dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-2-66'> The Infrastructure tab in the build menu. From here you can start placing buildings. </dd> </div> <div class='gallery-item'> <dt class='gallery-icon landscape'> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/007.jpg" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article-int', 'http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/007.jpg', '');"> <img width="150" height="150" src="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/150x150x007-150x150.jpg.pagespeed.ic.BLxxxxjgc1.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Tropico 5 Economy Report" aria-describedby="gallery-2-67" pagespeed_url_hash="2169475315"/> </a> </dt> <dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-2-67'> The Economy Report allows you the see an overview over your income and spending. </dd> </div> <div class='gallery-item'> <dt class='gallery-icon landscape'> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/008.jpg" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article-int', 'http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/008.jpg', '');"> <img width="150" height="150" src="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/150x150x008-150x150.jpg.pagespeed.ic.X9TiETk-CA.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Tropico 5 Dynasty Screen" aria-describedby="gallery-2-68" pagespeed_url_hash="3253997284"/> </a> </dt> <dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-2-68'> The Dynasty Screen allows you to level up and customize your dynasty. </dd> </div> <br style="clear: both"/> <div class='gallery-item'> <dt class='gallery-icon landscape'> <a href="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/009.jpg" onclick="__gaTracker('send', 'event', 'outbound-article-int', 'http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/009.jpg', '');"> <img width="150" height="150" src="http://www.citybuilder.info/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/150x150x009-150x150.jpg.pagespeed.ic.fiwWoqIZOZ.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Tropico 5 Research Screen" aria-describedby="gallery-2-69" pagespeed_url_hash="43551957"/> </a> </dt> <dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-2-69'> The Research Screen is where you do your research. To generate research points you have to build at least one Library. </dd> </div> <br style='clear: both'/> </div> <h2>Game Depth</h2> <p>The 13 productions cycles do the game well. You could make your island a tourist paradise or industry hell. The edicts you can issue add additional depth to Tropico 5. Optimizing your dynasty to get the maximum bonus from each of your dynasty members is a good idea and adds in a positive way to the depth of the game. The research that can be done allows to build new buildings, issue additional edicts and new constitutional options, to be successful make sure you do your research.</p> <p>All in all the game depth is good for broader audience.</p> <div class='at-below-post addthis-toolbox' data-title='Tropico 5 – Design your tropical island!' data-url='http://www.citybuilder.info/review/tropico-5/'></div> <div Auf einer italienischen Fähre vor der Küste Griechenlands ist am Sonntagmorgen ein Feuer ausgebrochen. Das Schiff mit 466 Menschen an Bord wurde unter dramatischen Umständen evakuiert, wie die griechischen Behörden mitteilten. Die Rettung wurde durch starken Wind (bis Stärke 8) sowie hohe Wellen erschwert. Laut Passagierliste sind sechs Personen aus Österreich auf dem Schiff. Das Außenministerium steht in Kontakt mit der betroffenen Reederei sowie den griechischen und italienischen Behörden. Ein Passagier hat sich bereits bei seinem Bruder in Tirol gemeldet.
